main_definition: Acquired ownership of an item by paying its price.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To buy something in exchange for money.
meanings_and_examples.example: She purchased a new car last week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of buying goods or services.
meanings_and_examples.example: His first act as CEO was to review the company's purchasing policy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When referring to acquiring a job, it means obtaining employment through an application process.
meanings_and_examples.example: After graduation, he purchased his dream job at a renowned tech firm.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To gain possession of something as part of legal or official procedures. For example, property bought from another party can be described as 'purchased.'
meanings_and_examples.example: The estate was purchased through an auction sale.
